Name: 1 week Black Country Faresaver
Description:
Valid on all National Express West Midlands buses in the Black Country only..

This travel product is now issued on the Swift card. You can buy and apply for your card today by selecting the Buy button above or visit New St or Wolverhampton Travel Information Centres.

Once you have your card you just keep renewing your product at one of 250 Payzone outlets or a Travel Information Centre. Online top-ups coming soon.

For more details visit National Express’ website.
Summary: Valid on National Express West Midlands buses only in the Black Country area

Name: 1 week Black Country nbus
Description:
This travel product is issued on the Swift card. You can buy and apply for your card today by selecting the Buy button.

Once you have your card you just keep renewing your product online or at one of 250 Payzone outlets.

Whatever you're travelling for, your daily commute, shopping trips, evenings out or visiting friends, there's no need to worry - an nbus ticket is all you need.

Check out where you can travel by selecting where to use.

*Valid on bus services in the specified area run by operators in the nbus Ticket Scheme .
Summary: Unlimited travel on all buses*, all day in theBlack Country Area

Once you have your card you just keep renewing your product at one of 250 Payzone outlets or a Travel Information Centre. Online top-ups coming soon.

Name: 1 week Coventry Faresaver Off-Peak
Description:
Off-Peak travel covers you between 0930 and 1529 and from 1800 to the end of daytime service Monday to Fridays, plus all day on weekends and Bank Holidays. Check out where you can travel by selecting where to use below.

This travel product is issued on the Swift card. You can buy and apply for your card today by selecting the Buy button.

Once you have your card you just keep renewing your product online or at one of 250 Payzone outlets.
Summary: Off Peak travel in and around Coventryon National Express West Midlands & National Express Coventry buses only

Name: 1 week nnetwork Zone 1
Description:
Allows unlimited regional bus * plus train travel within the specified Network West Midlands rail zones. Check out where you can travel by selecting where to use below.

The nnetwork ticket can also benefit the whole family and friends with the Friends and Family Fare allowing them to travel with you for next to nothing on the train.

*Valid on bus services in the West Midlands county and the specified areas as outlined in the bus map, run by operators in the Centrocard Ticket Scheme .
Summary: Regional bus plus train travel within the specified Rail Zones

Name: 1 week nnetwork Zones 1-4 with FIRST CLASS ADD-ON
Description:
Allows unlimited regional bus * and tram travel, plus train travel within the specified Network West Midlands rail zones including First Class** services. Check out where you can travel by selecting where to use below.

The nnetwork ticket can also benefit the whole family and friends with the Friends and Family Fare allowing them to travel with you for next to nothing on the train.

*Valid on bus services in the West Midlands county and the specified areas as outlined in the bus map, run by operators in the Centrocard Ticket Scheme .

**There is no guarantee that a First Class service provision is available on all trains. First class travel is principally provided on intercity rail services and are not available on the majority of local rail services in the region.
Summary: Regional bus and tram travel, plus train travel within the specified Rail Zones including First Class services

Name: 7 day West Midlands Diamond Ticket
Description:
Unlimited use on any Diamond bus* within the West Midlandsarea and service numbers 16 & 50 operated by Diamond for 7 consecutive days.

Passes can be purchased online or via the Head Office.*Excludes school & Park & Ride services. Please bear in mind that not all services operate every day.
Summary: Valid all Diamond buses in the West Midlands only

Name: Coventry Megarider 1-Week ADULT
Description:
Unlimited travel on any Stagecoach bus within the specified Coventry area including Bedworth, please see website for boundaries.

For details of where to purchase this ticket please click here Stagecoach Bus
Summary: Valid on Stagecoach buses only

Name: Coventry Megarider Gold 1-Week ADULT
Description:
Unlimited travel on any Stagecoach bus within the West Midlands, Warwickshire and adjacent Counties, anytime.

For details of where to purchase this ticket please click here Stagecoach Bus .
Summary: Valid on Stagecoach buses only

Name: Coventry Megarider Plus 1-Week ADULT
Description:
Unlimited travel on any Stagecoach bus within the wider Coventry area including Bedworth, Bulkington, Kenilworth and Wolston, please see website for boundaries.

For details of where to purchase this ticket please click here Stagecoach Bus
Summary: Valid on Stagecoach buses only

Name: Diamond Network Week Ticket
Description:
Unlimited use on any Diamond bus* within the West Midlands & Worcester area and service numbers 16 & 50 operated by Diamond for 7 consecutive days.

*Excludes school & Park & Ride services. Please bear in mind that not all services operate every day.
Summary: Valid on all Diamond buses in the West Midlands, Worcestershire & Wyvern
